0.1.name: wordpress/wp-plusone-this
0.1.description:
This is a simple plugin without any hassles, it automatically adds the Google Plus One Button to your WordPress posts and pages. There is no admin for this plugin since everything is done automatically, just upload the plugin , activate it and it will add the necessary code for the Google +1 Button to appear on every post and page. The Button will be located at the Top-Right Corner Inline with your posts.

Features:

  • Automatically included on Posts
  • Automatically included on Pages
  • Button location is at the Top-Right Corner Inline With the Text
  • Simple enough, Does not slow down your site, Does not mess up other plugins
